title: kindred is what league needed
body: congrats rito. u made a champ that can go every lane and role (xcept sup) and is really fun to play. we need more champs like this. maybe she does a wee bit too much dmg but thats nothing a few minor number changes wont fix. keep up the great work :)

replies.body:
ya every game i see with kindred, they start off good, then fall off hard.

i still have not seen a kindred **in one of my games** get more kills then deaths, its either equal or negative

LOL, I got  over 22 kills playing with golds... My deaths was like 14 tho by the end of late game. Also a quadra kill that game  almost instantly within a second.  We won too.

Generally Kindred sucks til they get like  3 or 4 items. Preferably lots of attack speed and crit. Last whisperer is good to add in as a  2nd or  3rd item.
It's the ult. Fucks up your team more then it helps xD

{{champion:10}}  mid, top, adc, sup and jungle.
{{champion:64}}  -adc
Eh, I never actually see her jungle.
She's stronger in lane in my opinion
wait untill she becomes the new quinn
Quin is still fun. Just buggy :/ granted your useless past laning phase unless you get massively ahead but ehh if you like Quin it's worth playing in normals
feel she a bit too strong starting off,  seen her kill without ignite and she pretty much good all game.

Yeah she needs a more clear power curve. Is she strong early? Is she strong late? What was she meant to be?  As an adc she obviously gets the late game scaling but as a jungle she requires a bit of early power for ganks. Maybe if they made her mid game horrible it would feel a bit more balanced.

{{champion:223}}  Top, jungle, Supp, Mid

{{champion:74}}  Top, mid, Jungle, Supp, Adc

{{champion:83}}  Top, mid, Jungle, Supp, ADC


Shit loads of champions that can play in lots of lanes and jungle.

Tahm is just bullshit eating his allies which feels like a zhonyas that moves you to safety for like 5 seconds. Bit on the broken side. Can also eat enemy's for all their health.
Heimer is just cancer to play against 
Yorick too
Kindred is a little less punishing to play against in my opinion. However these points don't make your argument invalid,  I just don't see any of those as fun for either side.
